name: react-zoomment
description: react-zoomment: A comprehensive React-based commenting widget, encapsulating advanced features such as Gravatar integration, theme customization, multi-lingual support, and reactions. Designed for seamless integration into React projects, this open-source library facilitates the creation of dynamic, engaging comment sections with enhanced privacy controls. Ideal for developers seeking to elevate web interaction within their React applications.
author: Tigran Simonyan
